conbody.p: abld [ test ] listing [-k] [-v] [ platform ] [ build ] [ program ] [ source_basename ]
This command creates an assembler listing file for a particular source file.
The listing file name has the format extension source_basename .lis. ABI-name.
The listing file is created in the build directory and then copied to the directory containing the source file.

example.p: Assuming myproject is a project, and cappui.cpp is the file to get the listing for, the following command would produce an ARMI release assembly listing for that file:
example.userinput: abld listing armi urel myproject cappui
example.p: This would produce an output file cappui.lis.armi.
